abstract: Nam Song Chol (Chosŏn'gŭl: 남성철; Hanja:南成哲;born 7 May 1982) is a North Korean international football player.Nam has appeared for the Korea DPR national football team in 19 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches, including a game against Iran where he was dismissed for pushing the referee.
